name: college-erp-dashboards
description: College ERP System with multiple dashboards

scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:faculty" "npm run start:family" "npm run start:student"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix auth-app && npm install --prefix college-erp-dashboard && npm install --prefix faculty-dashboard && npm install --prefix faculty-dashboard/family-dashboard && npm install --prefix student-dashboard
